title: [Songs of the West]
brief_description: A performance of the following three songs: 1. ‘Take me back to my boots and saddle’ with Rudy Vallee. 2. ‘Oh, Susanna ‘ with the Four Merry Men. 3. ‘Mrs Yankee Doodle’ with Virginia Meyers and the Four Merry Men.
